title: How to reduce ping when overseas
body: Hi Guys, So due to circumstances I would need to stay in Indonesia for the next couple of months. I've tried playing league but am getting 200ms ping 90% of the time, it is playable but not very enjoyable. Is there any ways I can reduce this? Because I would still like to play using my OCE account whilst I'm here and have mates to play with. Please help!!

replies.body: the _**only**_ way you can lower your ping is to move Sydney closer to Indonesia, otherwise a server swap is in order.
there isnt really much outside of using high speed internet and an ethernet cable, but that will only really fix spiking
maybe lowering the quality of the graphics would improve the ping? but don't take my word for it.

> [{quoted}](name=checkeredartist,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=exa0tZ7I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-23T01:05:31.312+0000)
>
> maybe lowering the quality of the graphics would improve the ping? but don't take my word for it.

no, it wouldn't.

you could try not playing league
